00016 #include "nidaqdso.h"

00018 #ifndef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00019     #define DAQmx_Val_FallingSlope 0
00020     #define DAQmx_Val_RisingSlope 0
00021     #define DAQmx_Val_DigEdge 0
00022     #define DAQmxGetReadAvailSampPerChan(x,y) 0
00023 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00024 
00025 #include <qmessagebox.h>
00026 #include <kmessagebox.h>
00027 #include "xwavengraph.h"

00029 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NIDAQmxDSO, "National Instruments DAQ as DSO");
00030 
00031 #define TASK_UNDEF ((TaskHandle)-1)
00032 #define NUM_MAX_CH 2
00033 
00034 XNIDAQmxDSO::XNIDAQmxDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00035                          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00036                          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00037                          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00038                          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00039     XNIDAQmxDriver<XDSO>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00040     m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest(0),
00041     m_task(TASK_UNDEF)
00042 {
00043     recordLength()->value(2000);
00044     timeWidth()->value(1e-2);
00045     average()->value(1);
00046     
00047     const char* sc[] = {"0.4", "1", "2", "4", "10", "20", "40", "84", 0L};
00048     for(int i = 0; sc[i]; i++)
00049     {
00050         vFullScale1()->add(sc[i]);
00051         vFullScale2()->add(sc[i]);
00052     }
00053     vFullScale1()->value("20");
00054     vFullScale2()->value("20");
00055     
00056     if(g_bUseMLock) {
00057         const void *FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER = &m_recordBuf;
00058         const void *LAST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER = &m_task;
00059         //Suppress swapping.
00060         mlock(FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER, (size_t)LAST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER - (size_t)FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER); 
00061     }
00062 
00063     vOffset1()->disable();
00064     vOffset2()->disable();
00065 }
00066 XNIDAQmxDSO::~XNIDAQmxDSO()
00067 {
00068     clearAcquision();
00069 }
00070 void
00071 XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigChanged(const shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &) {
00072     trigSource()->clear();
00073     std::string series = interface()->productSeries();
00074     {
00075         char buf[2048];
00076         {
00077             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevAIPhysicalChans(interface()->devName(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00078             std::deque<std::string> chans;
00079             XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, chans);
00080             for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = chans.begin(); it != chans.end(); it++) {
00081                 trigSource()->add(it->c_str());
00082             }
00083         }
00084         //M series
00085         const char* sc_m[] = {
00086             "PFI0", "PFI1", "PFI2", "PFI3", "PFI4", "PFI5", "PFI6", "PFI7",
00087             "PFI8", "PFI9", "PFI10", "PFI11", "PFI12", "PFI13", "PFI14", "PFI15",
00088             "Ctr0InternalOutput", "Ctr1InternalOutput",
00089             "Ctr0Source",
00090             "Ctr0Gate",
00091             "Ctr1Source",
00092             "Ctr1Gate",
00093             "FrequencyOutput",
00094             0L};
00095         //S series
00096         const char* sc_s[] = {
00097             "PFI0", "PFI1", "PFI2", "PFI3", "PFI4", "PFI5", "PFI6", "PFI7",
00098             "PFI8", "PFI9",
00099             "Ctr0InternalOutput",
00100             "OnboardClock",
00101             "Ctr0Source",
00102             "Ctr0Gate",
00103             0L};
00104         const char **sc = sc_m;
00105         if(series == "S")
00106             sc = sc_s;
00107         for(const char**it = sc; *it; it++) {
00108             std::string str(formatString("/%s/%s", interface()->devName(), *it));
00109             trigSource()->add(str);
00110         }
00111         atomic_shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList> 
00112             list(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::virtualTrigList());
00113         for(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList_it
00114                 it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00115             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (*it)->bits(); i++) {
00116                 trigSource()->add(
00117                     formatString("%s/line%d", (*it)->label(), i));
00118             }
00119         }
00120     }
00121 }
00122 void
00123 XNIDAQmxDSO::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00124 {
00125     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00126     m_running = false;
00127     char buf[2048];
00128     {
00129         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevAIPhysicalChans(interface()->devName(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00130         std::deque<std::string> chans;
00131         XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, chans);
00132         for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = chans.begin(); it != chans.end(); it++) {
00133             trace1()->add(it->c_str());
00134             trace2()->add(it->c_str());
00135         }
00136     }
00137     onSoftTrigChanged(shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger>());
00138 
00139     m_suspendRead = true;
00140     m_threadReadAI.reset(new XThread<XNIDAQmxDSO>(shared_from_this(),
00141                                                   &XNIDAQmxDSO::executeReadAI));
00142     m_threadReadAI->resume();
00143     
00144     this->start();
00145     
00146     m_lsnOnSoftTrigChanged = XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::onChange().connectWeak(
00147         shared_from_this(), &XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigChanged,
00148         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00149     createChannels();
00150 }
00151 void
00152 XNIDAQmxDSO::close() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00153 {
00154     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00155     
00156     m_lsnOnSoftTrigChanged.reset();
00157 
00158     try {
00159         clearAcquision();
00160     }
00161     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00162         e.print();
00163     }
00164     
00165     if(m_threadReadAI) {
00166         m_threadReadAI->terminate();
00167     }
00168     
00169     trace1()->clear();
00170     trace2()->clear();
00171     
00172     m_recordBuf.clear();
00173     m_record_av.clear();
00174 
00175     interface()->stop();
00176 }
00177 void
00178 XNIDAQmxDSO::clearAcquision() {
00179     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00180     m_suspendRead = true;
00181     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00182     
00183     disableTrigger();
00184 
00185     if(m_task != TASK_UNDEF) {
00186         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_task));
00187     }
00188     m_task = TASK_UNDEF;
00189 }
00190 void
00191 XNIDAQmxDSO::disableTrigger()
00192 {
00193     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00194     m_suspendRead = true;
00195     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00196     
00197     if(m_running) {
00198         m_running = false;
00199         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00200     }
00201     if(m_task != TASK_UNDEF) {
00202         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxDisableStartTrig(m_task));
00203         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxDisableRefTrig(m_task));
00204     }
00205     
00206     m_preTriggerPos = 0;
00207     m_trigRoute.reset();
00208 
00209     //reset virtual trigger setup.
00210     if(m_softwareTrigger)
00211         m_softwareTrigger->disconnect();
00212     m_lsnOnSoftTrigStarted.reset();
00213     m_softwareTrigger.reset();
00214 }
00215 void
00216 XNIDAQmxDSO::setupTrigger()
00217 {
00218     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00219     m_suspendRead = true;
00220     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00221     
00222     unsigned int pretrig = lrint(*trigPos() / 100.0 * *recordLength());
00223     m_preTriggerPos = pretrig;
00224     
00225     std::string atrig;
00226     std::string dtrig;
00227     std::string src = trigSource()->to_str();
00228 
00229     char buf[2048];
00230     {
00231         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevAIPhysicalChans(interface()->devName(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00232         std::deque<std::string> chans;
00233         XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, chans);
00234         for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = chans.begin(); it != chans.end(); it++) {
00235             if(src == *it)
00236                 atrig = *it;
00237         }
00238     }
00239     if(!atrig.length())
00240         dtrig = src;
00241     
00242     int32 trig_spec = *trigFalling() ? DAQmx_Val_FallingSlope : DAQmx_Val_RisingSlope;
00243     
00244     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00245         dtrig = m_softwareTrigger->armTerm();
00246         trig_spec = DAQmx_Val_RisingSlope;
00247         pretrig = 0;                    
00248         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOverWrite(m_task, DAQmx_Val_OverwriteUnreadSamps));
00249     }
00250     
00251     //Small # of pretriggers is not allowed for ReferenceTrigger.
00252     if(!m_softwareTrigger && (pretrig < 2)) {
00253         pretrig = 0;
00254         m_preTriggerPos = pretrig;
00255     }
00256     
00257     if(!pretrig) {
00258         if(atrig.length()) {
00259             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00260                 DAQmxCfgAnlgEdgeStartTrig(m_task,
00261                                           atrig.c_str(), trig_spec, *trigLevel()));
00262         }
00263         if(dtrig.length()) {
00264             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00265                 DAQmxCfgDigEdgeStartTrig(m_task,
00266                                          dtrig.c_str(), trig_spec));
00267         }
00268     }
00269     else {
00270         if(atrig.length()) {
00271             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00272                 DAQmxCfgAnlgEdgeRefTrig(m_task,
00273                                         atrig.c_str(), trig_spec, *trigLevel(), pretrig));
00274         }
00275         if(dtrig.length()) {
00276             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00277                 DAQmxCfgDigEdgeRefTrig(m_task,
00278                                        dtrig.c_str(), trig_spec, pretrig));
00279         }
00280     }
00281     
00282     char ch[256];
00283     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_task, ch, sizeof(ch)));
00284     if(interface()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_DMA_AI) {
00285         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetAIDataXferMech(m_task, ch,
00286                                                DAQmx_Val_Interrupts));
00287     }
00288     if(interface()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_XFER_COND_AI) {
00289         uInt32 bufsize;
00290         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputOnbrdBufSize(m_task, &bufsize));
00291         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00292             DAQmxSetAIDataXferReqCond(m_task, ch, 
00293                                       (m_softwareTrigger || (bufsize/2 < m_recordBuf.size())) ? DAQmx_Val_OnBrdMemNotEmpty :
00294                                       DAQmx_Val_OnBrdMemMoreThanHalfFull));
00295     }   
00296 }
00297 void
00298 XNIDAQmxDSO::setupSoftwareTrigger()
00299 {
00300     std::string src = trigSource()->to_str();
00301     //setup virtual trigger.
00302     atomic_shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList> 
00303         list(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::virtualTrigList());
00304     for(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList_it
00305             it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00306         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (*it)->bits(); i++) {
00307             if(src == formatString("%s/line%d", (*it)->label(), i)) {
00308                 m_softwareTrigger = *it;
00309                 m_softwareTrigger->connect(
00310                     !*trigFalling() ? (1uL << i) : 0,
00311                     *trigFalling() ? (1uL << i) : 0);
00312             }
00313         }
00314     }
00315 }
00316 void
00317 XNIDAQmxDSO::setupTiming()
00318 {
00319     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00320     m_suspendRead = true;
00321     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00322 
00323     if(m_running) {
00324         m_running = false;
00325         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00326     }
00327 
00328     uInt32 num_ch;
00329     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch)); 
00330     if(num_ch == 0) return;
00331 
00332     disableTrigger();
00333     setupSoftwareTrigger();
00334 
00335     const unsigned int len = *recordLength();
00336     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00337         DSORawRecord &rec = m_dsoRawRecordBanks[i];
00338         rec.record.resize(len * num_ch);
00339         rec.numCh = num_ch;
00340         if(g_bUseMLock) {
00341             mlock(&rec.record[0], rec.record.size() * sizeof(int32_t));
00342         }
00343     }
00344     m_recordBuf.resize(len * num_ch);
00345     if(g_bUseMLock) {
00346         mlock(&m_recordBuf[0], m_recordBuf.size() * sizeof(tRawAI));    
00347     }
00348 
00349     uInt32 onbrd_size;
00350     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputOnbrdBufSize(m_task, &onbrd_size));
00351     fprintf(stderr, "Using on-brd bufsize=%d\n", (int)onbrd_size);
00352     unsigned int bufsize = len;
00353     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00354         bufsize = std::max(bufsize * 8, (unsigned int)lrint((len / *timeWidth()) * 1.0));
00355         bufsize = std::max(bufsize, (unsigned int)onbrd_size);
00356     }
00357     
00358     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00359         DAQmxCfgSampClkTiming(m_task,
00360                               //! debug!
00361                               //        formatString("/%s/Ctr0InternalOutput", interface()->devName()),
00362                               NULL, // internal source
00363                               len / *timeWidth(),
00364                               DAQmx_Val_Rising,
00365                               !m_softwareTrigger ? DAQmx_Val_FiniteSamps : DAQmx_Val_ContSamps,
00366                               bufsize
00367                               ));
00368         
00369     interface()->synchronizeClock(m_task);
00370 
00371     {
00372         uInt32 size;
00373         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputBufSize(m_task, &size));
00374         fprintf(stderr, "Using buffer size of %d\n", (int)size);
00375         if(size != bufsize) {
00376             fprintf(stderr, "Try to modify buffer size from %d to %d\n", (int)size, (int)bufsize);
00377             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgInputBuffer(m_task, bufsize));
00378         }
00379     }
00380     
00381     float64 rate;
00382     //  CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetRefClkRate(m_task, &rate));
00383     //  dbgPrint(QString("Reference Clk rate = %1.").arg(rate));
00384     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetSampClkRate(m_task, &rate));
00385     m_interval = 1.0 / rate;
00386     
00387     setupTrigger();
00388     startSequence();
00389 }
00390 void
00391 XNIDAQmxDSO::createChannels()
00392 {
00393     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00394     m_suspendRead = true;
00395     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00396     
00397     clearAcquision();
00398     
00399     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &m_task));
00400     ASSERT(m_task != TASK_UNDEF);   
00401     
00402     if(*trace1() >= 0) {
00403         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00404             DAQmxCreateAIVoltageChan(m_task,
00405                                      trace1()->to_str().c_str(),
00406                                      "",
00407                                      DAQmx_Val_Cfg_Default,
00408                                      -atof(vFullScale1()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00409                                      atof(vFullScale1()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00410                                      DAQmx_Val_Volts,
00411                                      NULL
00412                                      ));
00413 
00414         //obtain range info.
00415         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00416             m_coeffAI[0][i] = 0.0;
00417         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00418             DAQmxGetAIDevScalingCoeff(m_task, 
00419                                       trace1()->to_str().c_str(),
00420                                       m_coeffAI[0], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00421     }
00422     if(*trace2() >= 0) {
00423         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00424             DAQmxCreateAIVoltageChan(m_task,
00425                                      trace2()->to_str().c_str(),
00426                                      "",
00427                                      DAQmx_Val_Cfg_Default,
00428                                      -atof(vFullScale2()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00429                                      atof(vFullScale2()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00430                                      DAQmx_Val_Volts,
00431                                      NULL
00432                                      ));
00433         //obtain range info.
00434         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00435             m_coeffAI[1][i] = 0.0;
00436         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAIDevScalingCoeff(m_task, 
00437                                                   trace2()->to_str().c_str(),
00438                                                   m_coeffAI[1], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00439     }
00440 
00441     uInt32 num_ch;
00442     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch)); 
00443     if(num_ch == 0)  {
00444         return;
00445     }
00446 
00447     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxRegisterDoneEvent(m_task, 0, &XNIDAQmxDSO::_onTaskDone, this));
00448 
00449     setupTiming();
00450 }
00451 void
00452 XNIDAQmxDSO::clearStoredSoftwareTrigger() {
00453     uInt64 total_samps = 0;
00454     if(m_running)
00455         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadTotalSampPerChanAcquired(m_task, &total_samps));
00456     m_softwareTrigger->clear(total_samps, 1.0 / m_interval);
00457 }
00458 void
00459 XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigStarted(const shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &) {
00460     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00461     m_suspendRead = true;
00462     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00463 
00464     if(m_running) {
00465         m_running = false;
00466         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00467     }
00468     
00469     const DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest]);
00470     m_softwareTrigger->setBlankTerm(m_interval * rec.recordLength);
00471     fprintf(stderr, "Virtual trig start.\n");
00472 
00473     uInt32 num_ch;
00474     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch)); 
00475     if(num_ch > 0) {
00476         int32 type;
00477         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetStartTrigType(m_task, &type));
00478         if(type != DAQmx_Val_DigEdge) {
00479             setupTrigger();
00480         }
00481         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00482         m_suspendRead = false;
00483         m_running = true;
00484     }
00485 }
00486 int32
00487 XNIDAQmxDSO::_onTaskDone(TaskHandle task, int32 status, void *data) {
00488     XNIDAQmxDSO *obj = reinterpret_cast<XNIDAQmxDSO*>(data);
00489     obj->onTaskDone(task, status);
00490     return status;
00491 }
00492 void
00493 XNIDAQmxDSO::onTaskDone(TaskHandle /*task*/, int32 status) {
00494     if(status) {
00495         gErrPrint(getLabel() + XNIDAQmxInterface::getNIDAQmxErrMessage(status));
00496         m_suspendRead = true;
00497     }
00498 }
00499 void
00500 XNIDAQmxDSO::onForceTriggerTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00501 {
00502     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00503     m_suspendRead = true;
00504     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00505 
00506     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00507         if(m_running) {
00508             uInt64 total_samps;
00509             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadTotalSampPerChanAcquired(m_task, &total_samps));
00510             m_softwareTrigger->forceStamp(total_samps, 1.0 / m_interval);
00511             m_suspendRead = false;
00512         }
00513     }
00514     else {
00515         disableTrigger();
00516         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00517         m_suspendRead = false;
00518         m_running = true;
00519     }
00520 }
00521 inline bool
00522 XNIDAQmxDSO::tryReadAISuspend(const atomic<bool> &terminated) {
00523     if(m_suspendRead) {
00524         m_readMutex.unlock();
00525         while(m_suspendRead && !terminated) usleep(30000);
00526         m_readMutex.lock();
00527         return true;
00528     }
00529     return false;
00530 }
00531 void *
00532 XNIDAQmxDSO::executeReadAI(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00533 {
00534     while(!terminated) {
00535         try {
00536             acquire(terminated);
00537         }
00538         catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00539             e.print(getLabel());
00540             m_suspendRead = true;
00541         }
00542     }
00543     return NULL;
00544 }
00545 void
00546 XNIDAQmxDSO::acquire(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00547 {
00548     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_readMutex);
00549     while(!terminated) {
00550 
00551         if(!m_running) {
00552             tryReadAISuspend(terminated);
00553             msecsleep(30);
00554             return;
00555         }
00556 
00557         uInt32 num_ch;
00558         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00559         if(num_ch == 0) {
00560             tryReadAISuspend(terminated);
00561             msecsleep(30);
00562             return;
00563         }
00564     
00565         const DSORawRecord &old_rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest]);
00566         if(num_ch != old_rec.numCh)
00567             throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Inconsistent channel number."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00568 
00569         const unsigned int size = m_recordBuf.size() / num_ch;
00570         const float64 freq = 1.0 / m_interval;
00571         unsigned int cnt = 0;
00572 
00573         if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00574             shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &vt(m_softwareTrigger);
00575         
00576             while(!terminated) {
00577                 if(tryReadAISuspend(terminated))
00578                     return;
00579                 uInt64 total_samps;
00580                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadTotalSampPerChanAcquired(m_task, &total_samps));
00581                 if(uint64_t lastcnt = vt->tryPopFront(total_samps, freq)) {
00582                     uInt32 bufsize;
00583                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputBufSize(m_task, &bufsize));
00584                     if(total_samps - lastcnt + m_preTriggerPos > bufsize * 4 / 5) {
00585                         gWarnPrint(KAME::i18n("Buffer Overflow."));
00586                         continue;
00587                     }
00588                     //set read pos.
00589                     int16 tmpbuf[NUM_MAX_CH];
00590                     int32 samps;
00591                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_MostRecentSamp));
00592                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, -1));
00593                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxReadBinaryI16(m_task, 1,
00594                                                        0, DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00595                                                        tmpbuf, NUM_MAX_CH, &samps, NULL
00596                                                        ));
00597                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_CurrReadPos));
00598                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00599                     uInt64 curr_rdpos;
00600                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadCurrReadPos(m_task, &curr_rdpos));
00601                     int32 offset = lastcnt - m_preTriggerPos - curr_rdpos;
00602                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, offset));
00603                     //                  fprintf(stderr, "hit! %d %d %d\n", (int)offset, (int)lastcnt, (int)m_preTriggerPos);
00604                     break;
00605                 }
00606                 usleep(lrint(1e6 * size * m_interval / 6));
00607             }
00608         }
00609         else {
00610             if(m_preTriggerPos) {
00611                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_FirstPretrigSamp));
00612             }
00613             else {
00614                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_FirstSample));
00615             }
00616             
00617             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00618         }
00619         if(terminated)
00620             return;
00621 
00622         const unsigned int num_samps = std::min(size, 8192u);
00623         for(; cnt < size;) {
00624             int32 samps;
00625             samps = std::min(size - cnt, num_samps);
00626             while(!terminated) {
00627                 if(tryReadAISuspend(terminated))
00628                     return;
00629                 uInt32 space;
00630                 int ret = DAQmxGetReadAvailSampPerChan(m_task, &space);
00631                 if(!ret && (space >= (uInt32)samps))
00632                     break;
00633                 usleep(lrint(1e6 * (samps - space) * m_interval));
00634             }
00635             if(terminated)
00636                 return;
00637             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxReadBinaryI16(m_task, samps,
00638                                                0.0, DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00639                                                &m_recordBuf[cnt * num_ch], samps * num_ch, &samps, NULL
00640                                                ));
00641             cnt += samps;
00642             if(!m_softwareTrigger) {
00643                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, cnt));
00644             }
00645             else {
00646                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00647             }
00648         }
00649 
00650         const unsigned int av = *average();
00651         const bool sseq = *singleSequence();
00652         //obtain unlocked bank.
00653         int bank;
00654         for(;;) {
00655             bank = 1 - m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest;
00656             if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00657                 break;
00658             bank = m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest;
00659             if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00660                 break;
00661         }
00662         writeBarrier();
00663         ASSERT((bank >= 0) && (bank < 2));
00664         DSORawRecord &new_rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank]);
00665         unsigned int accumcnt = old_rec.accumCount;
00666     
00667         if(!sseq || (accumcnt < av)) {
00668             if(!m_softwareTrigger) {
00669                 if(m_running) {
00670                     m_running = false;
00671                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00672                 }
00673                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00674                 m_running = true;
00675             }
00676         }
00677 
00678         cnt = std::min(cnt, old_rec.recordLength);
00679         new_rec.recordLength = cnt;
00680         //  num_ch = std::min(num_ch, old_rec->numCh);
00681         new_rec.numCh = num_ch;
00682         const unsigned int bufsize = new_rec.recordLength * num_ch;
00683         tRawAI *pbuf = &m_recordBuf[0];
00684         const int32_t *pold = &old_rec.record[0];
00685         int32_t *paccum = &new_rec.record[0];
00686         //for optimization.
00687         unsigned int div = bufsize / 4;
00688         unsigned int rest = bufsize % 4;
00689         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < div; i++) {
00690             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00691             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00692             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00693             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00694         }
00695         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < rest; i++)
00696             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00697         new_rec.acqCount = old_rec.acqCount + 1;
00698         accumcnt++;
00699 
00700         while(!sseq && (av <= m_record_av.size()) && !m_record_av.empty())  {
00701             int32_t *paccum = &(new_rec.record[0]);
00702             tRawAI *psub = &(m_record_av.front()[0]);
00703             unsigned int div = bufsize / 4;
00704             unsigned int rest = bufsize % 4;
00705             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < div; i++) {
00706                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00707                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00708                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00709                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00710             }
00711             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < rest; i++)
00712                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00713             m_record_av.pop_front();
00714             accumcnt--;
00715         }
00716         new_rec.accumCount = accumcnt;
00717         // substitute the record with the working set.
00718         m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest = bank;
00719         writeBarrier();
00720         new_rec.unlock();
00721         if(!sseq) {
00722             m_record_av.push_back(m_recordBuf);
00723         }
00724         if(sseq && (accumcnt >= av))  {
00725             if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00726                 if(m_running) {
00727                     m_suspendRead = true;
00728                 }
00729             }
00730         }
00731     }
00732 }
00733 void
00734 XNIDAQmxDSO::startSequence()
00735 {
00736     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00737     m_suspendRead = true;
00738     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00739 
00740     {
00741         m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest = 0;
00742         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00743             DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[i]);
00744             rec.acqCount = 0;
00745             rec.accumCount = 0;
00746         }
00747         DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[0]);
00748         if(!rec.numCh)
00749             return;
00750         rec.recordLength = rec.record.size() / rec.numCh;
00751         memset(&rec.record[0], 0, rec.record.size() * sizeof(int32_t));
00752     }
00753     m_record_av.clear();    
00754     
00755     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00756         if(!m_lsnOnSoftTrigStarted)
00757             m_lsnOnSoftTrigStarted = m_softwareTrigger->onStart().connectWeak(
00758                 shared_from_this(), &XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigStarted);
00759         if(m_running) {
00760             clearStoredSoftwareTrigger();
00761             m_suspendRead = false;
00762         }
00763         else {
00764             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_task, DAQmx_Val_Task_Commit));
00765             statusPrinter()->printMessage(KAME::i18n("Restart the software-trigger source."));
00766         }
00767     }
00768     else {
00769         if(m_running) {
00770             m_running = false;
00771             if(m_task != TASK_UNDEF)
00772                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00773         }
00774         uInt32 num_ch;
00775         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch)); 
00776         if(num_ch > 0) {
00777             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00778             m_suspendRead = false;
00779             m_running = true;
00780         }
00781     }
00782     //  CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00783 }
00784 
00785 int
00786 XNIDAQmxDSO::acqCount(bool *seq_busy)
00787 {
00788     const DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest]);
00789     *seq_busy = ((unsigned int)rec.acqCount < *average());
00790     return rec.acqCount;
00791 }
00792 
00793 double
00794 XNIDAQmxDSO::getTimeInterval()
00795 {
00796     return m_interval;
00797 }
00798 
00799 inline float64
00800 XNIDAQmxDSO::aiRawToVolt(const float64 *pcoeff, float64 raw)
00801 {
00802     float64 x = 1.0;
00803     float64 y = 0.0;
00804     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00805         y += *(pcoeff++) * x;
00806         x *= raw;
00807     }
00808     return y;
00809 }
00810 
00811 void
00812 XNIDAQmxDSO::getWave(std::deque<std::string> &)
00813 {
00814     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00815     
00816     int bank;
00817     for(;;) {
00818         bank = m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest;
00819         if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00820             break;
00821         bank = 1 - bank;
00822         if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00823             break;
00824     }
00825     readBarrier();
00826     ASSERT((bank >= 0) && (bank < 2));
00827     DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank]);
00828 
00829     if(rec.accumCount == 0) {
00830         rec.unlock();
00831         throw XDriver::XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00832     }
00833     const uInt32 num_ch = rec.numCh;
00834     const uInt32 len = rec.recordLength;
00835     
00836     char buf[2048];
00837     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadChannelsToRead(m_task, buf, sizeof(buf)));
00838     
00839     push((uint32_t)num_ch);
00840     push((uint32_t)m_preTriggerPos);
00841     push((uint32_t)len);
00842     push((uint32_t)rec.accumCount);
00843     push((double)m_interval);
00844     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < num_ch; ch++) {
00845         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00846             push((double)m_coeffAI[ch][i]);
00847         }
00848     }
00849     const int32_t *p = &(rec.record[0]);
00850     std::vector<char> &raw_data(rawData());
00851     const unsigned int size = len * num_ch;
00852     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00853         push(*p++, raw_data);
00854     std::string str(buf);
00855     rawData().insert(rawData().end(), str.begin(), str.end());
00856     str = ""; //reserved/
00857     rawData().insert(rawData().end(), str.begin(), str.end());
00858 
00859     rec.unlock();
00860 }
00861 void
00862 XNIDAQmxDSO::convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00863 {
00864     const unsigned int num_ch = pop<uint32_t>();
00865     const unsigned int pretrig = pop<uint32_t>();
00866     const unsigned int len = pop<uint32_t>();
00867     const unsigned int accumCount = pop<uint32_t>();
00868     const double interval = pop<double>();
00869 
00870     setParameters(num_ch, - (double)pretrig * interval, interval, len);
00871     
00872     double *wave[NUM_MAX_CH];
00873     float64 coeff[NUM_MAX_CH][CAL_POLY_ORDER];
00874     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < num_ch; j++) {
00875         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00876             coeff[j][i] = pop<double>();
00877         }
00878         
00879         wave[j] = waveDisp(j);
00880     }
00881 
00882     std::vector<char>::iterator &raw_data_it(rawDataPopIterator());
00883     const float64 prop = 1.0 / accumCount;
00884     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00885         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < num_ch; j++)
00886             *(wave[j])++ = aiRawToVolt(coeff[j], pop<int32_t>(raw_data_it) * prop);
00887     }
00888 }

00892     startSequence();
00893 }
